segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the beginning of a message and to transmit identifying number and the further specification of the message type (in data element 1001: Document name code), such as Stuffing confirmation, Stripping confirmation.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and/or time applying to the whole message, such as date and time of document or message issue.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify free form or processable supplementary information, such as: - change Information

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to specify a reference relating to the whole message, and its date and/or time.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to express a reference which applies to the entire message, such as: - reference to previous message - stuffing/stripping order reference - (sea) booking reference number

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and/or time related to the reference.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to identify vessel and voyage details.

segment.name: Transport information
segment.documentation: TDT, A segment to indicate the main carriage stage of the transport, such as carrier/liner service; also vessel/voyage details or inland transport details can be specified.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date(s) and time(s) related to the main carriage.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to specify an additional reference related to transport details

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to indicate places and ports related to the transport stage.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate a place/port corresponding to the transport stage.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to specify date(s) and time(s) related to a location.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments to identify a party and related contacts.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the party's name, address, and function, such as: - carrier agent (sea) - message recipient - message sender

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments to identify a contact and its communications related to the party.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department for contact purposes, such as: - information contact

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a person or department to whom communication should be directed.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments to specify stuffed or stripped containers.

segment.name: Equipment details
segment.documentation: EQD, A segment to specify container prefix and number, container size and type and other details.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to provide a reference relating to the equipment, such as: - container sequence number

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to specify the actual stuffing/stripping date/time.

segment.name: Transport service requirements
segment.documentation: TSR, A segment to specify special instructions and/or services regarding the container, such as: - off-dimensions

segment.name: Dimensions
segment.documentation: DIM, - off-standard dimensions front - off-standard dimensions rear - off-standard dimensions right - off-standard dimensions left - off-standard dimensions general (including length, width and height) - external equipment dimensions

segment.name: Seal number
segment.documentation: SEL, A segment to identify seal and seal issuer associated with the container, such as consolidator and carrier (sea).

segment.name: Attached equipment
segment.documentation: EQA, A segment to specify attached equipment, such as: - chassis - clip-on units such as generator sets

segment.name: Handling instructions
segment.documentation: HAN, A segment to specify handling instructions related to the container equipment.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment to specify a related address or party, such as: - container operator

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 7: A segment group to identify dangerous goods.

segment.name: Dangerous goods
segment.documentation: DGS, A segment to specify dangerous goods.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify supplementary details regarding the dangerous goods such as the technical name of the dangerous goods etc.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment to specify measurements of the dangerous goods, such as: - net net weight.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 8: A segment group to specify contact information including communication details regarding the dangerous goods.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department to be contacted regarding the dangerous goods.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment to specify communication details of the contact specified in the CTA segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 9: A segment group to identify transport related temperature settings.

segment.name: Temperature
segment.documentation: TMP, A segment to specify the type of transport related temperature such as storage, transport or operating temperature and also to optionally specify a single value temperature setting.

segment.name: Range details
segment.documentation: RNG, A segment to optionally specify the transport related temperature as a range of values.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments to describe a consignment stuffed into or stripped from LCL-containers (Less than Full Container Load).

segment.name: Consignment information
segment.documentation: CNI, A segment to indicate a stuffed or stripped consignment.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to identify a reference to an LCL-consignment, such as: - booking reference number (sea transport)

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments to describe the goods items of the consignment.

segment.name: Goods item details
segment.documentation: GID, A segment to identify a stuffed or stripped goods item. A goods item can be identified by a goods item number, number and type of packages.

segment.name: Handling instructions
segment.documentation: HAN, A segment to specify handling instructions relating to the goods item, such as: - hazardous cargo.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 12: A segment group to identify transport related temperature settings.

segment.name: Temperature
segment.documentation: TMP, A segment to specify the actual temperature setting for the goods item.

segment.name: Range details
segment.documentation: RNG, A segment to specify the actual temperature range setting for the goods item.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to describe the goods item.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment to specify measurements, other than dimensions, applicable to a goods item, such as: - gross weight - gross measurement/cube

segment.name: Package identification
segment.documentation: PCI, A segment to specify marks and numbers of a goods item.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: DOC, A segment to specify a document prepared for a goods item, such as relevant permits.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 13: A group of segments to specify the distribution of a goods item among the containers.

segment.name: Split goods placement
segment.documentation: SGP, A segment to identify the containers in which goods are (were) transported.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment to specify the gross weight of that portion of the goods item in the container.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 14: A group of segments to specify dangerous goods details related to the goods item. One goods item may be in different dangerous goods classes.

segment.name: Dangerous goods
segment.documentation: DGS, A segment to indicate the dangerous goods regulations for the corresponding mode of transport, class of dangerous goods, additional dangerous goods code, UN- number and shipment flash point.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify the dangerous goods technical name and to specify any additional dangerous goods information.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment to specify measurements of the dangerous goods, such as: - Net net weight

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 15: A segment group to specify contact information including communication details regarding the dangerous goods.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department to be contacted regarding the dangerous goods.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment to specify communication details of the contact specified in the CTA segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 16: A group of segments to specify the distribution of the dangerous goods among the containers.

segment.name: Split goods placement
segment.documentation: SGP, A segment to identify the containers in which the dangerous goods are (were) transported.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment to specify the net net weight of that portion of the dangerous goods in the equipment.

segment.name: Control total
segment.documentation: CNT, A segment to specify the number of containers in the message, explicitly given by the sender.
